vernac_cmds: Definition E1 (x:R) (N:nat) : R := sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => / INR (fact k) * x ^ k) N.
Lemma E1_cvg : forall x:R, Un_cv (E1 x) (exp x).
unfold exp_in, Un_cv; unfold infinite_sum, E1; trivial.
Definition Reste_E (x y:R) (N:nat) : R := sum_f_R0 (fun k:nat => sum_f_R0 (fun l:nat => / INR (fact (S (l + k))) * x ^ S (l + k) * (/ INR (fact (N - l)) * y ^ (N - l))) ( pred (N - k))) (pred N).
Lemma exp_form : forall (x y:R) (n:nat), (0 < n)%nat -> E1 x n * E1 y n - Reste_E x y n = E1 (x + y) n.
unfold Reste_E; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_r; apply sum_eq; intros.
unfold C; unfold Rdiv; repeat rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite (Rmult_comm (INR (fact i))); repeat rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_l_sym.
Definition maj_Reste_E (x y:R) (N:nat) : R := 4 * (Rmax 1 (Rmax (Rabs x) (Rabs y)) ^ (2 * N) / Rsqr (INR (fact (div2 (pred N))))).
Lemma div2_double : forall N:nat, div2 (2 * N) = N.
intro; induction N as [| N HrecN].
simpl; simpl in HrecN; rewrite HrecN; reflexivity.
Lemma div2_S_double : forall N:nat, div2 (S (2 * N)) = N.
intro; induction N as [| N HrecN].
simpl; simpl in HrecN; rewrite HrecN; reflexivity.
Lemma div2_not_R0 : forall N:nat, (1 < N)%nat -> (0 < div2 N)%nat.

left; apply lt_le_trans with 2%nat; [ apply lt_n_Sn | apply H1 ].
